subject: IMMEDIATE PAYMENT OF YOUR IN
body:
IMMEDIATE PAYMENT OF YOUR INHERITANCE FUND OF
$5.5M #: MAV/NNPC/FGNN/0122.
From the desk of:Mr:  RAX Williams
Managing Director African Developement Bank Plc,
International Settlement Dept.
Tel ;
ATTENTION: Dear Beneficiary ( )
Your Name And Your Contact Details Was Given To This Office In Respect
Of Your Total inherited/Contract Sum  Owed To You Which You Have
Failed To Claim Because Of Either Non-Compliance Of Official Processes
Or Because Of Your Unbelief Of The Reality Of Your Genuine Payment. We
Wish To Bring To You The Solution To This Problem. Right Now We Have
Arranged Your Payment waiting to hear from you to give order on the
means of transfer, That Is The Latest Instruction From Economic
Community Of West African States (ECOWAS).
Please Let Us Know By Contacting Us Back And Also Send The Following
Information As Listed Below.
1. Full Name....................................................
2. Phone And Fax Number.............................
3. Your Age And Current Occupation....................
4. Attach Copy Of Your Identification...........
We Have Been Mandated By The ECOWAS Parliament To Issue Out $5.5M in
your favour This fiscal year 2022. Also For Your Information, You Have
To Stop Any Further Communication With Any Other Person (S) Or
Office(S) To Avoid Any Hitches In Receiving Your Payment. Note That
Because Of Impostors, We Hereby Issued You Our Code Of Conduct, Which
Is (FGN2316UBN) So You Have To Indicate This Code When Contacting me.
Urgent Response await
Yours sincerely,
Mr:  RAX Williams
Managing Director African Developement Bank Plc
international Settlement Dept.

subject: Re:   IMMEDIATE PAYMENT OF YOUR IN
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite an unexpected message. I'm not aware of any inherited contract sum owed to me. Could you please provide more details about this? 

Also, could you explain what the Economic Community Of West African States (ECOWAS) has to do with my situation? I'm a bit confused about their involvement.

I appreciate your help in understanding this matter better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Karl
